title: Setting "wrap_in_directory: true" results in blank "{{ .ProjectName }}"

milestone.title: v1.0.0
milestone.description: Intended to be the first stable solution, with most of the features implemented.

body:
Using the latest goreleaser: `curl -sL https://git.io/goreleaser | bash` in Circle and setting:

```
archive:
  wrap_in_directory: true
```

the resulting archive files are in the following format: `_0.1.0-alpha1_linux_amd64.tar.gz`

.goreleaser.yml:

```
# Build customization
builds:
  - ldflags: -s -extldflags "-static"
    env:
      - CGO_ENABLED=0
    goos:
      - windows
      - darwin
      - linux
      - freebsd
    goarch:
      - 386
      - amd64
      - arm
      - arm64
release:
  github:
    owner: uw-labs
    name: strongbox
archive:
  wrap_in_directory: true
```
